sdesc: Experienced in building scalable Android applications using Kotlin, with expertise in modern UI/UX design patterns, navigation architecture, and responsive layouts.
Proficient in integrating Firebase services including Firestore, Authentication, and Cloud Functions for real-time, secure, and scalable backend support.
Skilled in designing RESTful APIs and consuming third-party APIs for seamless app communication, data synchronization, and remote operations.
Strong knowledge of Firestore and SQLite for handling both cloud-based and offline-first data storage, ensuring data persistence and reliability.
Comfortable working in collaborative environments, contributing to agile teams, and integrating feedback across design, product, and engineering teams.
Adept at identifying performance issues, debugging complex codebases, and delivering efficient, maintainable solutions under tight deadlines.
